constituent: dining tray, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, virtuous, sheep, horns, mouth
koohiiStory1: Some people insist that the serving maids who bring in the dining trays are especially virtuous and never let any man touch their flesh.
koohiiStory2: The virtuous vegan will not touch this dining tray because it has had a piece of meat on it.
kunYomi: かしわ、すす.める、そな.える
